Package com.winterhavenmc.roadblock.models.blocklocation

Interface BlockLocation

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockLocation.Invalid, BlockLocation.Valid
public sealed interface BlockLocation permits BlockLocation.Valid, BlockLocation.Invalid
A sealed type representing either a valid or invalid block location.
